metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10180 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in all pki-core 10.x.x version, where the TokenProcessing Service (TPS) did not properly sanitize several parametersstored for the tokens, possibly resulting in a Stored Cross Site Scripting(XSS) vulnerability. An attacker able to modify the parameters of any tokencould use this flaw to trick an authenticated user into executing arbitraryJavaScript code.

criterions.comment: dogtag-pki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
